item.title: Creating a little clipbox for your GIS projects in Python
item.description: When working on a GIS project, this always bums me out. You need to have a certain area in which you want to cut all your source data. But in ArcGIS I never figure out how to do it properly, except for using Python scripts and arcgisscripting/arcpy. But I figured, this should also be do-able from the terminal, and take less time and energy from your little workbox. But hereâ€™s a Python script that uses open-source libraries and writes
